Tanks

类 Tank

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tanks.Chara
      • Tanks.Tank

  • public class Tank
extends Chara
    Represents a tank in the game. Inherits from the Character class.

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 Tanks.Chara

        chara, x, xCor, y, yCor

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Tank(int xCor, int yCor, java.lang.Character chara, int[] RGB, java.lang.Boolean isHumanPlayer)
      Creates a tank with the specified x and y coordinates, character, RGB color values, and human player status.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Tank

        public Tank(int xCor,
            int yCor,
            java.lang.Character chara,
            int[] RGB,
            java.lang.Boolean isHumanPlayer)
        Creates a tank with the specified x and y coordinates, character, RGB color values, and human player status.
        参数:
        xCor - the x-coordinate of the tank
        yCor - the y-coordinate of the tank
        chara - the character of the tank
        RGB - the RGB color values of the tank
        isHumanPlayer - a boolean value indicating whether the tank is controlled by a human player

    • 方法详细资料

      • setShield

        public void setShield(boolean isShieldUp)
        Sets the shield status of the tank.
        参数:
        isShieldUp - a boolean value indicating whether the shield is up or not

      • setTeleport

        public void setTeleport(boolean canUseTeleport)
        Sets the ability of the tank to use teleportation.
        参数:
        canUseTeleport - true if the tank can use teleportation, false otherwise

      • canUseTeleport

        public boolean canUseTeleport()
        Returns a boolean value indicating whether the tank can use teleport.
        返回:
        true if the tank can use teleport, false otherwise.

      • teleport

        public void teleport(float x,
                     float y)
        Teleports the tank to the specified position.
        参数:
        x - the x-coordinate of the teleport position
        y - the y-coordinate of the teleport position

      • gainScore

        public void gainScore(int score)
        Increases the tank's score by the specified amount.
        参数:
        score - the amount by which to increase the score

      • isHumanPlayer

        public boolean isHumanPlayer()
        Returns whether the tank is controlled by a human player.
        返回:
        true if the tank is controlled by a human player, false otherwise.

      • tick

        public void tick()
        Updates the state of the tank for each game tick. This method handles the logic for tank movement, fuel consumption, collision detection, and health management.

      • isExploded

        public boolean isExploded()
        Returns a boolean value indicating whether the tank has exploded.
        返回:
